Act Definition.0: An Act further to amend the Advocates Act, 1961.

paragraphs.0: (1) This Act may be called the Advocates (Amendment) Act, 1976.
paragraphs.1: (2) Save as otherwise provided in this Act, it shall come into force on such date1 as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint and different dates may be appointed for different provisions of this Act.
